name: Medbot
description:
*Seizure Warning* There are bright blinking lights.

Tips:

Interactables (Doors, Switches, Objects etc) only work when the correct item is collected. The currently collected item is shown in the upper left corner.

Doors will open from a distance (when you're able to unlock them) and doing so will prevent the character from stopping and allow Medbot to move quickly and smoothly through doorways.

When monsters have access to crew members they will attack them and the game will end.

Medbot does not have an unlimited supply of medical supplies. Medbot needs to resupply after healing a crew member before healing another.

Art was created with PyxelEdit and code was created with Unity

I like making the 8-Bit music and sounds.

These are the free audio stuffs from this project...

Magical 8-Bit Synth --  http://www.ymck.net/en/download/magical8bitplug/

NES Synth -- https://www.mattmontag.com/projects-page/nintendo-vst

Valhalla Tape Echo -- https://valhalladsp.com/

Riviera Grain Reverb-- https://nuspaceaudio.com/2017/02/07/riviera-fast-hybrid-reverb-plugin-for-modeli...

Utility Channel Strip -- http://www.vennaudio.com/utility/

No6 Limiter -- https://vladgsound.wordpress.com/plugins/limiter6/

Kirnu Arpeggiator -- http://www.artovaarala.com/download/download.php

Miqu Sequencer -- http://www.klangmanipulation.de/indexvst.html
